item.description:
This meetup is for dues paying members of Greater Worcester Humanists.

Feel free to come if you would like to join that night.

I apologize for this last minute post.  At the last meeting I announced that there would be a subcommittee meeting on Monday, June 6th at the UU Church (where we usually meet).  I didn't think to post it here until tonight.  If you would like to play a bigger role in GWH and what we do, please feel free to join us.  

We currently have programming and outreach subcommittees.  

Programming deals with suggesting new speakers, movies and ideas for our meetings, setup and breakdown and organizing potlucks.  

Outreach deals with community outreach, volunteering and advocacy issues.  

We are going to discuss the future of each subcommittee and brainstorm for new ideas in the coming year.  We will have pizza and drinks around 6pm, but feel free to come a little later if you can't make it.  Please definitely RSVP if you will be joining us for pizza.
item.name: Subcommittee Meeting
